moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4: I like the Italian open. It seems to flow very well.
moves.3... Nf6 4. d3 d6 5. O-O Bg4: Right here I began to be excited. I wanted so badly to play this trap. I've played for years, known about this trap for some time and always looked for a place to use it.
moves.6. Nc3 Nd4: At this point I expected maybe a trade to destroy my castle structure.
moves.7. Kh1: Expected to move my rook over, because his Knight on f3 was halting my attack.
moves.7... Nh5: When I saw this move, I thought maybe I was dreaming! Opened the door for...
moves.8. Nxe5 Bxd1 9. Bxf7+ Ke7 10. Nd5#: I have never enjoyed a mate more than this. Never.
